entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
